mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.account_id AS "accountId", a.week_number AS "weekNumber", a.monday AS "monday", a.tuesday AS "tuesday", a.wednesday AS "wednesday", a.thursday AS "thursday", a.friday AS "friday", a.saturday AS "saturday", a.sunday AS "sunday"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM fx_customer_service_arrangement a
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fx_customer_service_arrangement( id, name, account_id, week_number, monday, tuesday, wednesday, thursday, friday, saturday, sunday ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{accountId}, #{weekNumber}, #{monday}, #{tuesday}, #{wednesday}, #{thursday}, #{friday}, #{saturday}, #{sunday} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fx_customer_service_arrangement SET name = #{name}, account_id = #{accountId}, week_number = #{weekNumber}, monday = #{monday}, tuesday = #{tuesday}, wednesday = #{wednesday}, thursday = #{thursday}, friday = #{friday}, saturday = #{saturday}, sunday = #{sunday} WHERE id = #{id}
